title: Error: components found but type is not tuple; report on GitHub
body:
I got this error that asked me to report on GitHub:

```
Error: components found but type is not tuple; report on GitHub

abort({}). Build with -s ASSERTIONS=1 for more info.
```

Hey @Amxx, thanks for reporting this.
Can you provide reproducible steps or a reproduction repo?

I cannot reproduce it consistently. Deleting the `build` folder and recompiling solves the issue. I don't know how to reproduce it 

it happens regularly when trying to migrate/test after having modified some contracts
Ah, I think you might have run into this issue #2048 which (hopefully 🤞) was resolved in 5.0.20, can you give that version a shot?
Looks like this is closeable! Let us know if we are wrong and we can reopen.
